title: Marco Rubio Challenges Obama Administration's New Approach To Cuba
teaser: Florida Republican Marco Rubio is using his new role as chairman of a Senate Foreign Relations subcommittee to rail against what he sees as U.S. concessions to Cuba. He's particularly concerned about plans to reopen the U.S. embassy in Havana.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
